arts.ttl: Bellingham and Mbappe shine as Real Madrid thrash Valencia
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham scores and Kylian Mbappe nets twice as Real Madrid open up a seven-point lead in La Liga with a comfortable win over Valencia at Santiago Bernabeu.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference After Real Madrid's Win vs Valencia in La Liga
arts.sum: Head coach Xabi Alonso spoke to the media after he watched the one-sided victory for Real Madrid, moving them five points clear of Barcelona. Alonso: “It was because he missed the penalty; it could have been 3-0 before halftime, but then Jude scored.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid thrash Valencia as Bayern Munich continue perfect start
arts.sum: New Juventus boss Luciano Spalletti made a winning start in Serie A at Cremonese.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 4-0 Valencia: Report & Full Match Highlights in Dominant Win for Los Blancos
arts.sum: Five minutes before half-time, the home team had another chance from the spot, Alvaro Carreras was brought down in the box. The game slowed down significantly in the early stages of the second half, with Real Madrid's urgency not as strong as in the first 45 minutes.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé overtakes Thierry Henry with Real Madrid goal vs Valencia

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Valencia: Confirmed Starting Lineup Announced for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso's team could move to eight points in front of Barcelona with a win, as they play tomorrow. He indeed sticks with Fede Valverde at right-back, with Trent likely getting second-half minutes.
